TopicTitle: Stock ships in the open craft list?

Articles.Content: The “include stock vessels” option is OFF, but I still see vessels in the list when I open the menu in the vab.  Did this change at some point?  Is there a way to eliminate these from the list?

If they're the making history crafts, it's a (hopefully) known bug. There's only a work-around, no solution to the problem.

After you build the craft, you can go to the launchpad, and they aren't there. But by the time you've built it, you probably want to launch it right away.

Edited April 23, 2021 by Wizard Kerbal
